$comment: Amazon product type definition for PRODUCT product type

item_name.$comment: This attribute is used to generate the title of the product which is displayed on the website
item_name.title: Title
item_name.description: Provide a title for the item that may be customer facing

value.title: Item Name
value.description: Provide a title for the item that may be customer facing

merchant_suggested_asin.$comment: This attribute represents the merchants suggested ASIN
merchant_suggested_asin.title: Merchant Suggested Asin
merchant_suggested_asin.description: If you believe that an ASIN already exists for your product, then please provide it here. Otherwise leave blank and the system will look for a match based on the External Product ID that you provided

value.title: Merchant Suggested Asin
value.description: If you believe that an ASIN already exists for your product, then please provide it here. Otherwise leave blank and the system will look for a match based on the External Product ID that you provided

recommended_browse_nodes.title: Recommended Browse Nodes
recommended_browse_nodes.description: Indicate the browse node or section of the Amazon website where the product will be assigned. This allows customers to find the product on the website easily. If you don't provide a node or if you provide an incorrect node, customers may not be able to find your product.

value.$comment: The browse node or section of the Amazon website where the product will sit. This allows customers to find the product on the website easily.
value.title: Recommended Browse Nodes
value.description: Indicate the browse node or section of the Amazon website where the product will be assigned. This allows customers to find the product on the website easily. If you don't provide a node or if you provide an incorrect node, customers may not be able to find your product.

list_price.$comment: This attribute represents the list price, also known as the manufacturer's suggested retail price (MSRP), the recommended retail price (RRP) or the suggested retail price (SRP) and is the price the manufacturer recommends the retailer sell the product for
list_price.title: List Price
list_price.description: Provide the list price for the product.  This is often referred to as the manufacturer's suggested retail price (MSRP), the recommended retail price (RRP) or the suggested retail price (SRP)

currency.$comment: The Manufacturer's Suggested Retail Price (MSRP)  for the product--not the price for which you plan  to sell it, which you'll specify later. This  information will be used to display "List Price" on the product detail page. Don't know the MSRP?  Leave it blank..
currency.title: List Price Currency

value_with_tax.title: List Price with Tax
value_with_tax.description: Provide the list price for the product including the tax.  List price is often referred to as the manufacturer's suggested retail price (MSRP), the recommended retail price (RRP) or the suggested retail price (SRP). This is not the offering or cost price.

value.title: Maximum Order Quantity
value.description: Max order quantity.

can_be_messaged.$comment: If you can print a gift message with the item indicate that here.  If left blank, defaults to 'false'
can_be_messaged.title: Offering Can Be Gift Messaged
can_be_messaged.description: If you can print a gift message with the item indicate that here.  If left blank, defaults to 'false'

can_be_wrapped.$comment: If you can gift wrap an item indicate that here.  If left blank, defaults to 'false'
can_be_wrapped.title: Is Gift Wrap Available
can_be_wrapped.description: If you can gift wrap an item indicate that here.  If left blank, defaults to 'false'

uvp_list_price.$comment: This attribute is a representation of suggested retail price in Germany
uvp_list_price.title: UVP List Price
uvp_list_price.description: Provide the UVP list price of the product

value.title: UVP List Price
value.description: Provide the UVP list price of the product

generic_keyword.$comment: This attribute represents terms that may be relevant to customer searches
generic_keyword.title: Generic Keyword
generic_keyword.description: Provide any terms that may be relevant to customer searches. No repetition, no competitor brand names or ASINs.
examples: Water sport shoes; Derek Rose; Electric; Wi-Fi; Banana

value.$comment: This attribute represents terms that may be relevant to customer searches.
value.title: Generic Keyword
value.description: Provide any terms that may be relevant to customer searches. No repetition, no competitor brand names or ASINs.
examples: Water sport shoes; Derek Rose; Electric; Wi-Fi; Banana

color.$comment: This attribute indicates the color of the product
color.title: Color
color.description: Provide the color of the product

value.title: Color
value.description: Provide the color of the product

language.$comment: This attribute represents languages associated with the product
language.title: Language
language.description: Select the appropriate language from the list of valid values

value.$comment: This attribute represents languages associated with the product.
value.title: Language
value.description: Select the appropriate language from the list of valid values

type.$comment: This attribute represents languages associated with the product.
type.title: Language Type

country_of_origin.$comment: This attribute indicates the product's country of origin
country_of_origin.title: Country of Origin
country_of_origin.description: Select the product's country of origin

value.$comment: This attribute indicates the product's country of origin.
value.title: Country of Origin
value.description: Select the product's country of origin
enumNames: Heard Island and the McDonald Islands
Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands
The Democratic Republic of the Congo

batteries_required.$comment: This attribute indicates whether or not an item requires batteries or is a battery
batteries_required.title: Are batteries required?
batteries_required.description: Select "yes" if batteries are required to power the item (or if the item is a battery) or no if they are not. Please note that an internal rechargeable battery is also considered a battery

value.title: Are batteries required?
value.description: Select "yes" if batteries are required to power the item (or if the item is a battery) or "no" if they are not. Please note that an internal rechargeable battery is also considered a battery

batteries_included.$comment: This attribute indicates whether or not batteries are included with the product
batteries_included.title: Are batteries included?
batteries_included.description: Select "yes" if batteries are contained in the product (e.g. batteries inside a pair of Bluetooth headphones) and/or included with the product (e.g. batteries packed separately with a camera), otherwise select "no"

value.title: Are batteries included?
value.description: Select "yes" if batteries are contained in the product (e.g. batteries inside a pair of Bluetooth headphones) and/or included with the product (e.g. batteries packed separately with a camera), otherwise select "no"

battery.$comment: This attribute represents information about the battery
battery.title: Battery

cell_composition.$comment: This attribute indicates the chemical composition of the battery cell
cell_composition.title: Battery Cell Composition
cell_composition.description: Select the chemical composition of the battery cell

value.title: Battery Cell Composition
value.description: Select the chemical composition of the battery cell

weight.$comment: This attribute indicates the physical net weight of the battery not including the packaging or the device it will be installed in
weight.title: Battery Weight
weight.description: Provide the total net weight of the batteries included. This is the weight of the standalone batteries not including packaging or the device it may be used in

value.title: Battery Weight
value.description: Provide the total net weight (numeric value) of the batteries included. This is the weight of the standalone batteries not including packaging or the device it may be used in.

num_batteries.$comment: This attribute represents the quantity and type of batteries that are required for the product
num_batteries.title: Number of Batteries
num_batteries.description: Provide the quantity and type of batteries needed to power the item.  If batteries are included with the item be sure to account for spare batteries provided

quantity.title: Number of Batteries
quantity.description: Specify the number of batteries needed to power the item.  If batteries are included with the item be sure to account for spare batteries provided

type.title: Battery Type
type.description: Specify the type of batteries needed to power the item

number_of_lithium_metal_cells.$comment: This attribute indicates the total number of Lithium Metal cells in the product where the cell isn't contained in an encased battery
number_of_lithium_metal_cells.title: Number of Lithium Metal Cells
number_of_lithium_metal_cells.description: Specify the total number of Lithium Metal cells in the product where the cell isn't contained in an encased battery (e.g. coin cells)

value.title: Number of Lithium Metal Cells
value.description: Specify the total number of Lithium Metal cells in the product where the cell isn't contained in an encased battery (e.g. coin cells)

number_of_lithium_ion_cells.$comment: This attribute indicates the total number of Lithium-ion cells in the product where the cell isn't contained in an encased battery
number_of_lithium_ion_cells.title: Number of Lithium-ion Cells
number_of_lithium_ion_cells.description: Specify the total number of Lithium-ion cells in the product where the cell isn't contained in an encased battery. For example, an AA battery is considered a cell

value.title: Number of Lithium-ion Cells
value.description: Specify the total number of Lithium-ion cells in the product where the cell isn't contained in an encased battery. For example, an AA battery is considered a cell

lithium_battery.title: Lithium Battery
lithium_battery.description: The attribute indicates the Lithium Battery of the product

energy_content.$comment: This attribute represents the total amount of energy stored in the lithium batteries
energy_content.title: Lithium Battery Energy Content
energy_content.description: Provide the total amount of energy stored in the Lithium batteries

value.title: Lithium Battery Energy Content
value.description: Provide the lithium battery energy content (numeric value)

packaging.$comment: This attribute indicates if the batteries are stand alone, contained in the item or included but not contained
packaging.title: Lithium Battery Packaging
packaging.description: Select “in equipment” if the battery is contained in the item . Select “with equipment” if the battery is packed separately with the device it is meant to power. Select “only” if the product is a battery sold alone or with items it is not meant to power.
examples: Batteries Contained in Equipment, Batteries Only, Batteries Packed with Equipment

value.title: Lithium Battery Packaging
value.description: Select “in equipment” if the battery is contained in the item . Select “with equipment” if the battery is packed separately with the device it is meant to power. Select “only” if the product is a battery sold alone or with items it is not meant to power.
examples: Batteries contained in equipment, Batteries packed with equipment, Batteries only

weight.$comment: This attribute indicates the weight of lithium contained in the cell or battery
weight.title: Lithium Battery Weight
weight.description: Provide the weight of lithium contained in the cell or battery

value.title: Lithium Battery Weight
value.description: Provide the weight of lithium contained in the cell or battery as a numeric value

supplier_declared_dg_hz_regulation.$comment: This attribute represents whether or not the product is a Dangerous Good, Hazardous Material, Substance or Waste that is regulated for transportation, storage, and/or waste
supplier_declared_dg_hz_regulation.title: Dangerous Goods Regulations
supplier_declared_dg_hz_regulation.description: If the product is a Dangerous Good or Hazardous Material, Substance or Waste that is regulated for transportation, storage, and/or waste select from the list of valid values

value.title: Dangerous Goods Regulations
value.description: If the product is a Dangerous Good or Hazardous Material, Substance or Waste that is regulated for transportation, storage, and/or waste select from the list of valid values

hazmat.$comment: This attribute represents a product's hazmat related information
hazmat.title: Hazmat
hazmat.description: Provide hazmat information that is relevant to the product based on the aspect selected

aspect.title: Hazmat Aspect
aspect.description: Select the aspect for the hazardous product information

value.title: Hazmat
value.description: Provide hazmat information that is relevant to the product based on the aspect selected

safety_data_sheet_url.$comment: This attribute provides information related to hazardous material SDS/MSDS such as physical data (flashpoint, pH, etc.), heath concerns, storage, and transportation that is relevant to the item
safety_data_sheet_url.title: Safety Data Sheet (SDS or MSDS) URL
safety_data_sheet_url.description: Provide the SDS/MSDS URL.  Required for Hazardous material SDS/MSDS provides information such as physical data (flashpoint, pH, etc.), heath concerns, storage, and transportation information for potentially dangerous substances.

value.title: Safety Data Sheet (SDS or MSDS) URL
value.description: Provide the SDS/MSDS URL.  Required for Hazardous material SDS/MSDS provides information such as physical data (flashpoint, pH, etc.), heath concerns, storage, and transportation information for potentially dangerous substances.

item_weight.$comment: This attribute represents the weight of the item only
item_weight.title: Item Weight
item_weight.description: Provide the weight of the item (not including the packaging)

value.title: Item Weight
value.description: Provide the item weight numeric value (not including the packaging)

ghs.$comment: This attribute indicates the warning statement and category assigned by the Global Harmonized System (GHS) classification system
ghs.title: GHS
ghs.description: Provide the Global Harmonized System (GHS) information

classification.$comment: This attribute indicates the class and category assigned by the Global Harmonized System (GHS) classification system
classification.title: GHS Classification
classification.description: Provide the Global Harmonized System (GHS) CLP classification for the product

class.title: GHS Class
class.description: Select the class from the list of valid values
enumNames: Amazon Specific No Label With Warning

main_product_image_locator.title: Main Product Image Locator
main_product_image_locator.description: The attribute indicates the Main Product Image Locator of the product

media_location.$comment: The URL where a main image of the product is located.  It's important that this is supplied for all products.
media_location.title: Main Image URL
media_location.description: The URL where the main offer-specific image of the product is located.

other_product_image_locator_1.title: Other Product Image Locator 1
other_product_image_locator_1.description: The attribute indicates the Other Product Image Locator 1 of the product

media_location.$comment: The URL for additional images of your product. These images will be shown on the detail page when the customer clicks through to see other views associated with the product.
media_location.title: Other Image URL
media_location.description: The URL for additional images of your product. These images will be shown on the detail page when the customer clicks through to see other views associated with the product.

other_product_image_locator_2.title: Other Product Image Locator 2
other_product_image_locator_2.description: The attribute indicates the Other Product Image Locator 2 of the product

media_location.$comment: The URL for additional images of your product. These images will be shown on the detail page when the customer clicks through to see other views associated with the product.
media_location.title: Other Image URL
media_location.description: The URL for additional images of your product. These images will be shown on the detail page when the customer clicks through to see other views associated with the product.

other_product_image_locator_3.description: The attribute indicates the Other Product Image Locator 3 of the product

other_product_image_locator_4.description: The attribute indicates the Other Product Image Locator 4 of the product

media_location.title: Other Image URL
media_location.description: The URL for additional images of your product. These images will be shown on the detail page when the customer clicks through to see other views associated with the product.

other_product_image_locator_5.description: The attribute indicates the Other Product Image Locator 5 of the product

media_location.title: Other Image URL
media_location.description: The URL for additional images of your product. These images will be shown on the detail page when the customer clicks through to see other views associated with the product.

other_product_image_locator_6.title: Other Product Image Locator 6
other_product_image_locator_6.description: The attribute indicates the Other Product Image Locator 6 of the product

media_location.$comment: The URL for additional images of your product. These images will be shown on the detail page when the customer clicks through to see other views associated with the product.

media_location.description: The URL for additional images of your product. These images will be shown on the detail page when the customer clicks through to see other views associated with the product.

other_product_image_locator_7.description: The attribute indicates the Other Product Image Locator 7 of the product

media_location.title: Other Image URL
media_location.description: The URL for additional images of your product. These images will be shown on the detail page when the customer clicks through to see other views associated with the product.

other_product_image_locator_8.description: The attribute indicates the Other Product Image Locator 8 of the product

media_location.title: Other Image URL

swatch_product_image_locator.title: Swatch Product Image Locator
swatch_product_image_locator.description: The attribute indicates the Swatch Product Image Locator of the product

media_location.$comment: The URL where an image of a color swatch from the product is located
media_location.title: Swatch Image URL
media_location.description: The URL where an image of a color swatch from the product is located

item_dimensions.$comment: This attribute represents the dimensions of the item
item_dimensions.title: Item Dimensions

length.title: Item Length
length.description: Provide the length of the item

value.title: Item Length
value.description: Provide the item length as a numeric value.

unit.title: Item Length Unit
unit.description: Select the unit of measure for Item Length. If a value is provided for Item Length, you must also enter the corresponding unit.

width.title: Item Width
width.description: Provide the width of the item

value.title: Item Width
value.description: Provide the item width as a numeric value.

unit.title: Item Width Unit
unit.description: Select the unit of measure for Item Width. If a value is provided for Item Width, you must also enter the corresponding unit.

height.title: Item Height
height.description: Provide the height of the item

value.title: Item Height
value.description: Provide the item height as a numeric value.

unit.title: Item Height Unit
unit.description: Select the unit of measure for Item Height. If a value is provided for Item Height, you must also enter the corresponding unit.

item_package_dimensions.$comment: This attribute represents the dimensions of the item in its package
item_package_dimensions.title: Item Package Dimensions

value.title: Item Package Length
value.description: Provide the package length as a numeric value.

unit.title: Package Length Unit
unit.description: Select the unit of measure for Package Length. If a value is provided for Package Length, you must also enter the corresponding unit.

value.title: Item Package Width
value.description: Provide the package width as a numeric value.

unit.title: Package Width Unit
unit.description: Select the unit of measure for Package Width. If a value is provided for Package Width, you must also enter the corresponding unit.

value.title: Item Package Height
value.description: Provide the package height as a numeric value.

unit.title: Package Height Unit
unit.description: Select the unit of measure for Package Height. If a value is provided for Package Height, you must also enter the corresponding unit.

item_package_weight.$comment: This attribute represents the weight of the item plus the packaging
item_package_weight.title: Item Package Weight
item_package_weight.description: Provide the weight of the item plus the packaging

value.title: Package Weight
value.description: This attribute represents the weight of the item plus the packaging. If your item is shipped to the customer in multiple packages, enter the dimensions of the heaviest package

unit.title: Package Weight Unit
unit.description: Select the unit of measure for Package Weight. If a value is provided for Package Weight, you must also enter the corresponding unit.
